data.text:
Table of Contents

Key Databases

Canadian

International

French-Language

Historical Archives

Key Databases

Canadian Newsstream

'Canadian Major Dailies' including The Globe and Mail, Toronto Star, National Post, Montreal Gazette, The Halifax Chronicle Herald, Ottawa Citizen, Regina Leader-Post, Edmonton Journal, Vancouver Sun, and many others

Full-text (some French)

View titles indexed - over 400 sources

Factiva (3 user limit)

Canadian, International and regional newspapers including The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, The Washington Post, Financial Times, The Times, El Pais and The Guardian

Full-text (in over 25 languages) - best bet for foreign newspapers

Newswires, transcripts TV or radio podcasts including BBC, CNN, ABC, CBS, NBC and Fox

View titles indexed (Excel file) - over 30k sources from 200 countries in 28 languages

Search tips (note: our subscription excludes personalized customizations like alerts)

Nexis Uni (formerly LexisNexis Academic)

Canadian + International news (with special focus on business and legal sources)

Full-text (multiple languages)

Newswires, transcripts included

PressReader

Full-page digital replicas of print edition (including images, advertisements, etc.)

5,000+ international, daily publications in 60+ languages

Scope: up to 90 days in back-issues (depending on title)

Download to your mobile device using the PressReader app

Off-campus access through Carleton's Virtual Private Network (VPN)

The Globe & Mail changed its access policy on PressReader - see access notes for details

Canadian

Canadian Business & Current Affairs Database

Full-text (some French)

News Magazines

Newswires and Transcripts

Sources indexed

Canadiana

Books

Newspapers

Periodicals

Images

Archival Materials

CPI.Q - Canadian Periodicals Index Quarterly

periodicals and local newspapers

Canadian + International

Full-text (English & French)

Eureka.cc

Full-text (English & French) + select scanned images

Transcripts (radio & television)

Hill Times Online (2002- )

Canadian politics and the Federal Government

The Wire Report (2000- )

Covering the telecom and media sectors

International

Academic OneFile

Full-text

search by publication name

Alternative Press Index

Citations + select scanned images

see also Alternative Press Index Archive

Argumenty i Fakty

Russian

Full-text (in Russian, some English)

Current Digest of the Russian Press

Russian

Full-text (in Russian, some English)

Independent Voices: An Open Access Collection of an Alternative Press

Full-page digital replicas

Current, but emphasis on 1900-1930 & 1960-1980

International Security & Counter Terrorism Reference Center (ISCTRC)

Focus on terrorism and security issues

French Language

Remember to use French keywords

Canadian Newsstream (French + English resource)

Isolate language filter to French

Eureka.cc (French + English resource)

Adjust 'Canada (ENG+FR)' to 'Canada (FR)'

Rep√®re

French-language index to newspapers and other periodicals

No full-text

Most news databases also include French-language publications, including Factiva, Nexis Uni, PressReader, Canadian Business & Current Affairs Database, etc.

African Newspapers

Full-text (multiple languages)

Center for Research Libraries (CRL) Catalog

Canadian + International

Archives available through Interlibrary Loans

Chronicling America: Historic American Newspapers

American

Scanned images

Foreign Broadcast Information Service (FBIS) Daily Reports

International

Full-text (media reports - translated to English) in scanned images

Transcripts (radio & television)

until 1996 - continued by World News Collection - Archive (until 2013)

Google News Archives Search

Tip: Search versus Browse archive achieve different results! Full-text index is incomplete for many newspapers. Try browsing to particular date range instead.

Globe and Mail: Canada's Heritage from 1844 (1844-2015)

Maclean's (1905-present)

Best bet for historical: Maclean's Magazine Archive (1905-2015)

Note: Maclean's and Time magazine Archives can be both search together on the Ebsco platform (via "Choose databases")
